item.title: Version 1.2.18 (Build 20260108.2)
item.description:
What's New

feat: Add Vietnamese input control to Window Title Rules

  • Add 'disableVietnameseInput' option to WindowTitleRule for automatic Vietnamese input toggling
  • Implement state preservation: save Vietnamese state before rule applies, restore when rule ends
  • Add overlay-aware Vietnamese control: restore pre-rule state when overlay apps (Spotlight/Raycast/Alfred) open
  • Refactor Terminal panel detection: move from OverlayAppDetector to AppBehaviorDetector using AX Description
  • Add UI toggle in WindowTitleRulesView for Vietnamese input control with visual badges (VN ON/OFF)
  • Improve click detection timing: increase delay to 0.15s for better window title detection in VSCode
  • Add comprehensive debug logging for Vietnamese state transitions
  • Bump build version to 20260108.2

This allows users to automatically disable Vietnamese input for specific apps/windows (e.g., coding environments) while preserving the state for overlay apps and restoring it when returning to normal contexts.
